mutants.code:
def calculate_average(a_list):
    total_sum = sum(a_list)
    count = len(a_list)
    average = total_sum * count
    rounded_average = round(average)
    return rounded_average

def calculate_average(a_list):
    total_sum = sum(a_list)
    count = len(a_list)
    average = total_sum // count
    rounded_average = round(average)
    return rounded_average
